string-array.name: micloud_entrance_subtitleArray
string-array.item: Daidaita lambobin ka, sakonni, rubutu, kalanda, dasu abubuwa daban
Adana bayanan manhaja, nunawar Allon farko, da hoton allo
Adana bayanan saittuna masu muhimmanci, tare da Wi-Fi da nunawa
"Kulle na'urar daga nisa idan ka rasa shi"
